name: Hellen's Journey
description:
A JOURNEY THROUGH DIFFERENT WORLDS: in the game the player travels across
3 different worlds each one characterized by peculiar environments and unique threats.

MOVE, AIM, SHOOT: fast action. In each room, the player has to dodge and shoot,
avoiding to get damaged by enemies.

KILL THEM ALL: different kind of enemies placed in rooms of variable size offer a
stimulating challenge. Kill all the enemies in a room to get to the next one.

GO FOR THE HIGH SCORE: strong arcade component. Players actions are rewarded
with points. Be fast and don’t get hit to get an high score. As you end a run, why don’t
you start another one and try to beat your highscore?

EXTRA STAGES: if you look for something different from the normal stages then try the extra mode.

DEVELOPED BY: 

I FAGIANI (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2018/2019)

GAME DESIGN
Lorenzo Santagata
Fabio Mellone
Mattia Verrienti
